website_summaries.verdict: Real feathers, salon quality, and attractive colors that look pretty, whether you are a blond, brunette, redhead, or any color in between.
pros: Individual, natural features that come in an assortment of neutral shades
Blend nicely in nearly any hair color
Can be washed, styled, curled, or flat ironed
Most feathers in the kit are 8 inches to 11 inches long
Comes with beads and loop tool
cons: A few customers gripe about receiving several very short feathers in the kit

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Range of Colors
customer_reviews.text: My pack of feathers range from about 7 in. to about 12 in. Most of the feathers are around 9 in. My hair is really long and somewhat curly, but these feathers look great mixed in. I would have given 5 stars, but there weren't any instructions on how to actually put the feathers in or use the beads. I ended up buying smaller, metal beads at a craft store instead. They look good and have lasted about a week now! They seem secure enough and good enough quality to last for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvey Pro

customer_reviews.title: Just like I remembered!
customer_reviews.text: I had feather extensions maybe 10 years ago.. the thought popped in my mind and sure enough they were on amazon! Haha! I have two in my hair now and I love them! They’re great quality and super simple to put in!
customer_reviews.author: LehcaR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: They are slender and pretty! I have auburn hair and these blend nicely enough to be a pretty surprise, I got the natural colour but next time I’m definitely getting blue. They don’t come with any type of pliers which I thought the description said they did, but I looked at so many sets I could be mistaken. It came with just enough of the clips for the feathers and unfortunately 4 of the rubber inserts weren’t inside the clips properly so they didn’t hold at all. I had to double up a few of the feathers to make up for the lack of clips.
customer_reviews.author: CampB

customer_reviews.title: Strong and soft
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Feathers are soft and sturdy and pretty easy to install. I only got 19 in my order but that is more than enough for good coverage. I bundled them in groups of 3 with eyelash glue, and let it dry, before installing them so that it was super easy to insert into the bead. Have had them in for 3 weeks and, while my hair has grown a tad, they're still holding strong
customer_reviews.author: D. Overbye

customer_reviews.title: Super cool look
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. I have taken them in and out, reused feathers, curled, blow-dried, straightened, washed and they're still pretty similar to when I bought them maybe a year ago. Hard to put in and take out though. I kind of dread that part and it doesn't come out with a clamping tool. Unclamping is the hardest.
customer_reviews.author: The Sullivans

customer_reviews.title: Variety in colors of feathers aren't near what they are in the photo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these feathers mainly because of the white and yellow/tannish feathers and lighter colors. I got white and black feathers, then mostly brown and like 2 whites. I have dark hair and I feel like they don't look good in contrast to my hair or like it's a weird highlight mess up. Also, the picture instructions online aren't that great.
customer_reviews.author: Other Than

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the plastic thread as described
customer_reviews.text: super bummed! These feathers are duper culver but they did not come the with the tools needed to attach the feathers. A friend of mine got this kit and it came with a small clear plastic thread-type tool to attach feather and clip. This did not, although it says it should in the description. Seller does not accept returns or else I would be returning this. I will be contacting amazing for assistance. Hopefully seller sees this and can help me out! I’ll gladly increase the rating if so!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.. But gorgeous..
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my DIY hair clips and they worked great! High quality. Smooth as silk. Real feathers. My only reason for 4 stars is I found the exact same product on another site for 70% less money. Otherwise 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Longer feathers please!
customer_reviews.text: These were sooooo fun!!!! Definitely a learning curve when putting them in but once u get the hang of it it's super easy! I had 5 in my hair the first time I did it and they stayed in for 3 1/2 weeks! I eventually pulled them out myself after 3 1/2 weeks because they had traveled an inch down my hair during that time. The only thing is I wished they were longer. The feathers were shorter than my hair.
customer_reviews.author: K.Bell

customer_reviews.title: East to put on - kit comes with everything
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these to arrive, they were easy to put on and stayed for 3 weeks. I was only disappointing with how many red feathers I got. I wanted brown to blend with my hair. I got 4 brown, 2 blonde, 3 white and 11 red feathers.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline H F

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Little Accent
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are beautiful. Haven't put them in my hair, yet. Waiting to get it cut first. But I love the colors and styles. They are just like the first feather extension I ever had, which was also my favorite. While I do believe the feathers are 7-11 inches long (probably closer to 7 inches on most, but I don't mind since I was planning on having to cut them down a little bit), don't expect them to look like the feathers in the photo of the girl with dark hair. They are very thin, only about 3mm in width. But, that being said, I love the fact that they're thin because I'm all for subtlety. Overall, love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hair stylist tried to put a few in her short hair but said they frayed, I didn’t have that issue
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had six in my hair for almost two months! I’ve gotten sooo many compliments and will definitely be putting in new ones come my next hair appointment.
customer_reviews.author: AYC04

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These feathers are great! They came exactly as described and aren't too short -- I have pretty long hair so that's something I was concerned about. The variety of natural colors allows them to be visible in various different hair colors as well. I shared my feathers with 2 friends, one who has black hair and one who is blonde, and both their bunches look amazing! I'd recommend these feathers to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and quantity. Super easy to install and most can even be reused a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Leave the feathers where they belong... With the birds! Not worth the chicken scratch!! Booo!!!
customer_reviews.text: The feathers were beautiful, colorful, and soft. They were not what I thought they would be. There were not too many and they were short. It was easy to apply and DARE I type?!... easy to fall out. Booo! Hiss! The amount of money spent was not worth it! It was a mistake purchase and I feel like I've been egged!
customer_reviews.author: °•NAT•°

customer_reviews.title: Fun extensions
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I wish they were a few inches longer. I have really long hair and I think it looks a little tacky that they don't reach the end of my hair. I do enjoy the colors though. I like the more natural look but you can't see them as well as you could the fun bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love these! You can treat them just like hair I've already straightened them. I haven't installed them yet, but I will tomorrow. Love the Variety and natural colors.
customer_reviews.author: GiannaBella

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cool, fun and super easy to get it in! I put the feather through the “loop” tool with my hair versus inserting the feather into the bead after the hair is already in there. These literally take seconds to put in and add a great boho chic look to your outfit!
customer_reviews.author: AZGAL

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These hair feathers are so cute that even my boys who are too cool for everything wanted me to put them in their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Original order was wrong and they did an amazing job making it right! I would order again knowing someone cares!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was so excited they still make these. I had them over 10 years ago and happy to express my style with them again
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: you cannot return these!!
customer_reviews.text: nice enough but shorter than expected and you cannot return. order others instead. all basically the same so order others in-case they are too short for your hair too. never even opened.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They stay in for about a month for me, but when I have done them for other people they don’t stay in as long
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and fun
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are good quality. Love the colors. Thanks for the directions; my hair stylist hadn’t done them in a while and we were able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Feathers!!
customer_reviews.text: It did take me a minute to figure out the loop - but easy to use! I’m glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: calico83

customer_reviews.title: Long but very very thin feathers. Need quite a few to show
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, I bought both the neon and the neutral pack, but very disappointed in the width of the feathers. They are long as specified, but they are so thin that you have to do at least 4 in a section to even see. I feel like what you get is not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love them. There great for people who are low maintenance hair but want something different
customer_reviews.author: nicole lotz

customer_reviews.title: The Discription Is Not What It Says!
customer_reviews.text: First off you don't get the Bonus Beads or the Tool Kit plus there are not 20 feathers! I'm very unhappy with this purchase and the fact I can't return it!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Buying more. Might need someone to help you put in your hair. I was eventually able to do it on my own. I’ve gotten so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Millagrazi04

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and pretty easy to use, you get a lot as well i am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mikah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and I've had them in my hair for almost a month now!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for blonde hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVED these I purchased the feathers for me and my daughters hair and we love them! This set comes with everything you need feathers,beads for every hair color, and the tools to put the bead on your hair ! All you need is Pliers to clamp the bead!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: I liked these! They were thinner than most feathers like ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked these! They were thinner than most feathers like some of the other reviews, but I am planning on grouping 3 or so of them and then putting them in my daughters hair. Very nice feathers though and look so natural!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Most were about 6" but they are really nice. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not as long as I thought they would be. Most were about 6" but they are really nice. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Easy to attach. I got these for my granddaughter and she has had it in her hair for y weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Kaymie

customer_reviews.title: The feathers are nice
customer_reviews.text: The feathers are nice and i love the colors, how ever the quailty of the tool (small plastic loop) is poor, and the pictures of the tool to put the feathers in is deceiving. Also the beads that come with it aren't very good quality either. I say just get the feathers and buy a seperate tool kit
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are real feathers. And last a very long time and since they are real, they don’t get Dámage when they get wet while taking a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! love
customer_reviews.text: Love! love! Love!... very good quality and soft to the touch feathers. The feathers are not bulky so it gives a beautiful kiss of character to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: KayK

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I got these feather extensions and LOVE them! They’re so easy to use and so cute. They’re easy to apply and are very secure. I’m obsessed with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty. I wore them with my Halloween costume and they added just the right touch.
customer_reviews.author: drc_future50

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Just as described and easy to attach. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Mine didnt come with kit, which was the only reason why I chose this bundle instead of others.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great feathers! Exactly what the pictures show
customer_reviews.text: Great feathers! Exactly what the pictures show. And the follow up emails from the seller show how much they care about satisfied buyers. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great. They lasted over 2 months (during the summer when I was doing a lot of different things). They were fun and with the help of a friend, very easy to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I put three in my daughter's hair
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I put three in my daughter's hair. We went for the peak a boo look. She loves them. I have the rest in my hair. Seller emailed instructions and they were so simple to put in. I also love that you can curl and brush the feathers. I'm not at all worried they will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: cool product!
customer_reviews.text: My set didn't come with the loop. That's a bummer. However I sent an email to let them know about the incident and they were very polite and sent me my missing piece. The quality of the actual feather extensions are awesome. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, varied in length and color, high quality. Well worth the affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They lasted in my hair weeks until I decided to take them out!!! My husband was able to put them in for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Zolnowski

customer_reviews.title: Picture will come haven't put them in yet
customer_reviews.text: Feathers look great -except half of them got cut when I used scissors to open large package -small feather package was lodged in the envelope flap -oh well -some r ok and will send pix later
customer_reviews.author: marilynn lageman

customer_reviews.title: Consumer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Descriptions says: 100% Real Rooster Feathers, however, the package says "hand-dyed" and nothing about being it being 100% real rooster feathers AND *This item isn't eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Plastic loop is cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! They are super cute. But the second feather I tried to put into my hair the plastic loop broke! I’m pretty unhappy I spent 20$ on a product just for it to break the 1st use!
customer_reviews.author: Carlin Cook

customer_reviews.title: I didnt receive the beads or loop tool
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product one star just because I did not receive the beads or the loop tool to put the actual feathers in my hair I paid $25 for 20 feathers but no beads or loop
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality thin strip like feathers.
customer_reviews.text: Hi quality thin strip like feathers...perfect for an accessory for your hair! Very pleased and excited to show them off!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply with their tools
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are gorgeous, I get tons of compliments. Easy to apply with their tools!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but a little pricey for the small amount you get. But they are very soft and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with how cheap and thin these feathers are. The beads are very thick and the tool is very small and would be hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Quality at length were way above average
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a long time fan of feathers but this seller offers the best quality and length that I’ve ever recieved. I recieved them extremely quickly.. overall I am extremely happy and will be buying only from here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put them in my hair I was having fun. Nice thing I wash my hair and curled ...
customer_reviews.text: At first when I received the package I was what is this! I put them in my hair I was having fun. Nice thing I wash my hair and curled my hair. They stayed in my hair. I even put in my hot curlers and they curled. They look the same as when I bought them. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: picture girl

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the feathers are great. I love that you can customize how subtle or dramatic you want it to look. They aren't as long as I expected but they still look cute!! I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marlaina Caetano

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it. I can't give an opinion on how ...
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. I can't give an opinion on how it wears, but I saw her wearing it, and I found it very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: qbathree

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! I get so many compliments on them! They are tough and stay in my hair. I can wash them and style them and are still great quality!

customer_reviews.title: They’re adorable! First time doing this and they were very ...
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Megan ! They’re adorable ! First time doing this and they were very easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Feathers are beautiful! I received them super quick! The one down fall was the feathers were shorter then I had expected. That could have just been my error too for either not reading the length or just assuming they would be long since I searched XL extensions. Otherwise impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the look I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Loved!! My daughter and I used these feathers in our hair to give us a bohemian look for our beach vacay!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful feathers, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful feathers, great quality, i put mine in almost as soon as i got them and they are holding up fantastically!

customer_reviews.text: I love them! They were everything I expected them to be and the company made sure to email me instructions on how to put them in. They add such a subtle touch and all my friends want them now!

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these feathers!!! I love having just a little peekaboo moment and they work perfectly. Super easy to put in.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.text: Love mine and have had feathers for years. Had great fun introducing them to my family!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I think this trend is making a ...
customer_reviews.text: I always buy my feathers from this shop. Great quality! I think this trend is making a come back and I’m definitely excited about it 🤗

customer_reviews.title: 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Just what I had in mind when I paid for it.

I've had to take them out and re apply the bead because of hair growth but the feathers are still in great shape! You can wash flat iron and curl!

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these really excited to add something fun to my hair but was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these really excited to add something fun to my hair but was disappointed. I opened the package and they were way too short for me, so they would only go to the ends of your hair if you had a bob or other really short haircut. I don't think I got my money's worth for $20 because I don't like a lot of the feathers and didn't use most of them because he feathers I received did not match the picture provided. The actual feathers are soft and would probably look good on others with the right hair.
customer_reviews.author: TP Jr.

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Says in the description these are LONG(product description says they're 11") feathers. When they arrived I see they're about 3" long. Complete lies in the description of the product. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 20+ dollars
customer_reviews.text: I only received 18 feathers and and they are very thin, and very short. I wouldn't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Feather Hair Extensions, 100% Real Rooster Feathers, Long Natural Colors, 20 Feathers with Bonus Free Beads and Loop Tool Kit, by Feather Lily NB
product_meta.description: Feather hair extensions are a gorgeous way to spice up your hairstyle! Pack includes 20 feathers along with free loop and beads for attaching. These feathers are 100% real authentic rooster saddle feathers from the USA. They are 8-11 inches long (20-28cm) and can be washed and heat styled. Feather Lily Feathers are used in salons around the USA and are of premium quality. These are a perfect gift for the girl in your life. Don't know what to get a teen or tween for their birthday? Popular and trendy hair feathers are the best present! Get some now and add flair to your hair!
feature_bullets: 20 Loose Feather Hair Extensions in a mix of natural colors
Includes 20 beads and small loop tool kit for installation
Can be washed, styled, flat ironed, and curled with your natural hair
Premium Salon Quality Feathers; Will last for months with proper care
